description:
********* Free Candy and Jewel Match 3 Game! **********

********* Addicting Jewel Candy-Swapping Fun **********

Craving some sweet and shimmering popping action? Stop yourself from drooling from this awesome candy elimination game that is sure to get you hooked. Pick your favorite boosts mix, match jewels or candies and pop as fast as you can to hit that intense sugar high.

This game brings out your favorite sweets and jewels to life with physics and visuals that are fun and dynamic. Enjoy yummy designs and challenging stages mixed with shining, shimmering action. To play, simply switch and match your way through various levels in this delicious and sparkling puzzle adventure.

Dip your fingers into the sweetest game ever!

Features:

* Simplistic user interface
* Cute and colorful graphics
* Play with your friends
* Multiple difficulty levels
* Fun for all ages

Indulge your sweet tooth craving!

Download FREE Today!
